metadata.dc:author: Bermejo Fenoll, A
López Nicolas, M
Cabrerizo Merino, M C
García Ballesta, C
Cegarra Beltri, M
metadata.dc:description: In this present work the authors state the importance of a careful anamnesis in a adenopathy in the maxillofacial pediatric area. Ever though in most cases the origin is purely dental, it can often have another etiology, such as tuberculosis.
metadata.dc:title: Actitud del odontopediatra ante las adenopatias de la región maxilofacial. A propósito de un caso de adenopatía tuberculosa.
[Attitude of pedodontists toward maxillofacial adenopathies. Apropos of a case of tuberculous adenopathy].
